attributes.action: to intervene to prevent the proposed closure of Redhill Stores Post Office, Arnold, Nottingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 1st October 2007, Post Office Ltd. announced the proposed closure of the Redhill Stores Post Office, Arnold, Nottingham. 

We believe that this Post Office is a focal point for the local community, and is an essential amenity and service provider - particularly to the socially disadvantaged, marginalised and vulnerable.

We reject the closure and ask that the Government looks again at new ways of allowing sub-post offices to provide the new services that will secure their future.
